title: I'm sorry but ya'll are really over reacting about the whole OE thing.
body:
Yes it fucks you if you actually buy hex tech chests with RP, the simple way to solve this is to not buy hex tech chests with OE, instead buy a you want skin. 
I'v been playing since the beginning of season 4, back in those days you had two choices.
1) buy a skin you wanted with RP.
2) find a buddy and swap mystery skin gifts. 

Since Hex tech crafting was released I have acquired at least 10 skins probably more, free of charge. I didn't  have to pay a dime out of my pocket.
This past week Riot gave you two free skin shards just for playing league through the quests. 
I re rolled those two skin shards plus one I already owned and got arcade ezreal. Riot just gave me $20 worth of content for free. 

Just be grateful you get anything for free.  

I know the OE changes suck, but still stop being ungrateful.
